author: Christopher Livingston
description: A new patch lets you recover your swallowed rides, though there's a catch. And a cost.
title: Shai Hulud defanged: In Dune: Awakening, your vehicles are no longer permanently lost if a sandworm eats them

author: Lincoln Carpenter
description: Streets of Fortuna, Kitfox's own in-development "megasim," is chasing that same systems-driven storytelling.
title: Founder of Dwarf Fortress and Caves of Qud publisher Kitfox Games says its procgen sims for sickos are 'giving storytelling tools back to the people when games and passive media took them away'

author: Andy Chalk
description: All current and future owners of the 25th Anniversary remaster will get the original edition for free, but it will no longer be available for separate purchase on Steam.
title: The original System Shock 2 is being removed from sale on Steam later this week

author: Andy Chalk
description: It sure looks like something funky is going on.
title: Today's Steam outage may have been part of a massive DDoS attack targeting Xbox, PlayStation, Riot, and other game companies

author: Rich Stanton
description: Also hit the button marked 'say it's like Battlefield 3 and 4' once more with feeling.

description: Major changes to crafting are finally on their way.

description: Users in seven countries including Germany, Ireland, Korea, and Poland will continue to roll along at the old price, as long as they have a recurring subscription.
title: Game Pass subscribers 'in certain countries' will not be affected by the price increase, at least 'for now,' because sometimes government regulation is actually a good thing

author: Christopher Livingston
description: A ticking clock on every single mission doesn't particularly appeal to me.

description: Can't wait.
